moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Withdraw
moves.description: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat.

moves.name: Supersonic
moves.description: The user generates odd sound waves from its body. It may confuse the target.

moves.name: Icicle Spear
moves.description: The user launches sharp icicles at the target. It strikes two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Protect
moves.description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

moves.name: Clamp
moves.description: The target is clamped and squeezed by the user's very thick and sturdy shell for four to five turns.

moves.name: Ice Shard
moves.description: The user flash freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Razor Shell
moves.description: The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This attack may also lower the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Aurora Beam
moves.description: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Whirlpool
moves.description: Traps foes in a violent swirling whirlpool for four to five turns.

moves.name: Brine
moves.description: If the target's HP is down to about half, this attack will hit with double the power.

moves.name: Iron Defense
moves.description: The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

moves.name: Ice Beam
moves.description: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid.

moves.name: Shell Smash
moves.description: The user breaks its shell, lowering its Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply raising Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

moves.name: Hydro Pump
moves.description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.
